alias_for.desc: Name of the emoji for which the alias is being made. Any wrapping whitespace or colons will be automatically trimmed.

name.desc: The new alias for the specified emoji. Any wrapping whitespace or colons will be automatically trimmed.

errors.emoji_limit_reached: Unable to add emoji due to limit reached.
errors.error_invalid_alias: Value passed for `alias_for` does not exist.
errors.error_missing_name: Value passed for `name` is missing or empty.
errors.error_name_taken_i18n: The name has already been taken by another emoji, in the international set. Emoji must have unique names.
errors.failed_to_alias_emoji: Failed to alias the specified emoji.
errors.feature_not_enabled: The Admin APIs feature is not enabled for this team.
errors.not_an_admin: This method is only accessible by org owners and Admins.
